name: ml-engine
description: Python backend engine used in ML-SIM
author: Charles N. Christensen

scripts.pyinstaller: pipenv run pyinstaller pysrc/engine.py --add-data ./pysrc/extra_dll/vcomp140.dll;./ --hidden-import sklearn.neighbors.typedefs --hidden-import sklearn --hidden-import sklearn.utils --hidden-import sklearn.utils._cython_blas --distpath . -y --noconfirm
scripts.pypush: aws s3 cp engine.mlsim s3://mlsim/pdist/ && aws s3 cp latest.json s3://mlsim/pdist/
